pages.title: Great White Shark
pages.text: It is notable for its size, with larger female individuals growing to 6.1 m ($(o)20 ft$()) in length and 1,905–2,268 kg ($(o)4,200–5,000 lb$()) in weight at maturity.$(br2)However, most are smaller; males measure 3.4 to 4.0 m ($(o)11 to 13 ft$()), and females measure 4.6 to 4.9 m ($(o)15 to 16 ft$()) on average.
